question: ‘Antarrashtriya Yoga Diwas Media Samman’, the first-of-its-kind award to media houses, is presented by which Union Ministry?
option1: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
explanation: The ‘Antarrashtriya Yoga Diwas Media Samman’ award was instituted in June 2019, to recognise the contribution of media in spreading Yoga. The first edition of the award is to be conferred to 30 media houses, by the Union Information and Broadcasting Minister Prakash Javadekar. The awards will be presented in three categories, namely ‘Best Media Coverage of Yoga in Newspapers’, ‘Best Media Coverage of Yoga in Television’ and ‘Best Media Coverage of Yoga in Radio’.
